records.quote: I feel like I could be batman, you could be batman, anyone can be batman
records.author: Ken Carson

records.quote: To succeed, you have to do something and be very bad at it for a while. You have to look bad before you can look really good.
records.author: Barbara DeAngelis

quote.quote: I'm only here so I dont get fined
quote.author: Marshawn Lynch
